acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill in complex (e.g. with more than two generic types), read-only POJOs
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldFillReadOnlyComplexTypes

test-step.description: When I invoke Podam for a Generic Pojo specifying the concrete types
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type 1713276109603426
Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type -1248315600=MOqzg0y4Yb and value of type -341710743=HygMK4rN0K
Then the Object should not be null
Then the Object should not be null
Then the two objects class java.lang.Character and class java.lang.Character should be equal
